description.text: This spell functions as hex glyph, except you can store a hex or a major hex (but not a grand hex). You trace the glyph with incense, which must first be sprinkled with powdered diamond (as noted in the material line).

sections.Components: V, S, M (powdered diamond worth 400 gp)
sections.Targets: or Area object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level
